design_workshop.title: Design Workshop
design_workshop.preview: A two part project: one part illustration, one part narrative. It was born out of a desire to make without a problem, to make for the sake of making.

design_docs_v2.title: Design Docs V2
design_docs_v2.preview: Design Docs V2.0 brings a new site built in Next.js, refined content, and a dedicated domain at designdocs.co. It aims to give early career designers resources and a roadmap to improve their craft, prepare a portfolio, and get their first job in the industry.

02.title: Adding a Favicon in 2024
02.preview: What do we actually need to do to add a favicon to a site in 2024? With a little Astro flavor.

fig-gen.title: fig-gen: Making Generative art in Figma.
fig-gen.preview: Exploring the new Automator plugin for Figma. I thought exploring a minimal generative series using pixels and mapping equations would be a fun way to try it out.

ios_11_gui_wallpapers.title: iOS 11 GUI Wallpapers
ios_11_gui_wallpapers.preview: A set of wallpapers bundled with the Facebook.design iOS 11 GUI.

00.title: Building a new site with Astro
00.preview: It's that time of year again – time to build a new site. This time, I'm using Astro. Here's how it's going.

01.title: Generating a Content Index
01.preview: Ahead of some schemes of building site-wide content search, and perhaps an RSS feed, let's build a content index.
